explains: v. 分离；分隔；断绝关系（separate 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: Bicycle lanes can relieve traffic jam by separating bicycles from cars.
sentences.cn: 自行车道可以把自行车和汽车分隔开，从而缓解交通拥堵。

sentences.en: One of the greatest gulfs separating the driving nations is the Atlantic Ocean.
sentences.cn: 大西洋是分隔驾车族的最大海湾之一。

sentences.en: You can actually initialize multiple things at once by separating them with a comma, and this is sometimes helpful.
sentences.cn: 实际上，您可以通过用逗号分隔多个事物来一次初始化它们，有时这很有帮助。
